title: Guided Studies
description: To attend seminars/workshops and carry out assignments for the purposes of increasing knowledge of the research area and improving experimental design and data analysis.
outcome: The programme is research-oriented. It will follow a prescribed series of investigation and students should inform themselves in depth about the field of knowledge relevant to the topic of their projects. Students will be required to submit a research thesis and pass an oral examination for graduation.
syllabus: This is thesis monitoring course. Guided Studies allows learning through the guidance from the supervisor, on subject matter relevant to the research project. Independent learning and understanding of research skills are facilitated. The research project and thesis writing are monitored and guided by the supervisor with guidance.

title: Seminar
description: To present a seminar summarizing research work performed in the previous term/year.
outcome: The programme is research-oriented. Students should show ability for independent work and inform themselves in depth about the fields of knowledge relevant to the topic of their projects. Students will be required to submit a research thesis and pass an oral examination for graduation.
syllabus: This is thesis monitoring course. Seminar allows presentation of research materials and relevant scientific updates. It is guided by the supervisor.

title: Research
description: To conduct laboratory-based research work on the assigned research topic.
outcome: The programme is research-oriented. Students should show ability for independent work and inform themselves in depth about the fields of knowledge relevant to the topic of their projects. Students will be required to submit a research thesis and pass an oral examination for graduation.
syllabus: This is thesis monitoring course. Research projects and thesis are guided by the supervisor.
